name: PREGNANCY_BABY_SEXES
description: This table contains information about the sex of fetuses (I HSB 35575) during a pregnancy episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREG_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the suspected sex of the fetus during pregnancy, including multiple gestations, or whether the parents want it to be a surprise.
